sentences.en: All the people in the hotels were wrapped in deep slumber.
sentences.cn: 住在各旅馆里的人都已进入梦乡.

sentences.en: And so thy thoughts, when thou art gone, love itself shall slumber on.
sentences.cn: 你一旦离去, 对你的思念, 爱将恬睡在你的心房.

sentences.en: At last, she drifted off into slumber.
Coercer : Slumber - Mesmerize effect can now affect Epic targets.
sentences.cn: Coer:Slumber 造成的催眠效果将能作用在Epic级目标上.

sentences.en: Do not give sleep to your eyes, Nor slumber to your eyelids.
sentences.cn: 4不容你的眼睛睡觉, 不容你的眼皮打盹.

sentences.en: Don't wake him from his slumber because he needs the rest.
sentences.cn: 不要把他从睡眠中唤醒,因为他需要休息.

sentences.en: He awoke from a deep slumber.
He had fallen into exhausted slumber.
He passed into a deep slumber.
Her eyes were lightly closed, as if in a day - dream or a light slumber.
sentences.cn: 她二目轻轻地闭着, 好象正做着美梦或微微入睡一般.

sentences.en: I could not have been long in bed when I fell into a slumber.
sentences.cn: 上床不一会儿,我就睡着了.

sentences.en: Mountains in which I dwell , great - hipped, bigbreasted, slumber on the western sky.
sentences.cn: 黛色的兰岭山,那是我居住的地方, 她象风姿绰约的女郎,依然安睡在浩瀚的天幕之下.

sentences.en: She fell into a deep and peaceful slumber.
sentences.cn: 她睡着了，睡得又沉又香。
她进入宁静的安眠之中.

sentences.en: Slumber fell on their tired eyelids like the light rain of spring upon the freshturned earth.
sentences.cn: 睡意降临到他们劳困的眼皮上,如同柔和的春雨落在新翻耕的地里.

sentences.en: The dark Blue Ridge Mountains in which I dwell, great - hipped, big - breasted, slumber on the western sky.
sentences.cn: 黛色的兰岭山,那是我居住的地方, 它象臀丰乳高的女郎, 依然安睡在浩瀚的天幕之下.

sentences.en: The older three girls are still slumbering peacefully.
sentences.cn: 稍大些的3个女孩仍在平静地睡着。

words.tran_cn: 催眠的；昏昏欲睡的；不活跃的；平静的（等于slumbrous）
催眠的（等于slumberous）；昏昏欲睡的

trans.tran_cn: 微睡，睡眠，蛰伏，处于静止状态，（用睡眠）消磨（时间）
